Skulduggery Pleasant

The Beginning

Published: 2007 28 Chapters ~8 hours

When twelve-year-old Stephanie inherits her weird uncle's estate, she discovers a world of magic, monsters, and a living skeleton detective.

Contains spoilers for Book 1

Stephanie Edgley becomes Valkyrie Cain and partners with Skulduggery Pleasant to stop Serpine from obtaining the Sceptre of the Ancients.

View Analysis
2

Playing with Fire

The Adventure Continues

Published: 2008 30 Chapters ~9 hours

Valkyrie and Skulduggery face a new threat as the Grotesquery is assembled and Baron Vengeous returns from prison.

Contains spoilers for Book 2

Baron Vengeous attempts to bring back the Faceless Ones using the Grotesquery. Tanith Low joins the team and Mr. Bliss makes the ultimate sacrifice.

View Analysis
3

The Faceless Ones

The First Trilogy Concludes

Published: 2009 32 Chapters ~10 hours

The Faceless Ones return to reclaim their world, and Valkyrie must make an impossible choice to save everyone she loves.

Contains spoilers for Book 3

Valkyrie sacrifices herself to close the portal, spending time in the Faceless Ones' dimension before returning with Skulduggery's help.

View Analysis
